title: Adding an address to personal information for mailing of your diploma
shortdesc: Students can add an address for mailing their diploma to their personal information in MyPack Portal

taskbody.prereq: Must be enrolled as a student Must have a Mypack Portal account

step.cmd: Go online to Mypack Portal log in web page
Once logged in select the Personal Information tile
On the left-hand navigation menu, select Personal Information

Select Addresses. Under Diploma Address header if no address is defined, click add address. If you have an address already on file you can use the Copy From button to copy that address into the Diploma Address area.
Add your address information in the fields provided
Click the green Save button to save your updates
